metatags.twitter:creator: @GlobalLF
metatags.og:description: Download organizers’ statement: Governing frontier landscapes: Insights from the Global Landscapes Forum 2014 Landscapes across many developing countries are experiencing rapid changes mostly due to increasing demand for food and other natural resources, exacerbated by drivers such as climate change. Over time, these frontier landscapes often give rise to “novel societies” with a diversity of …
